alert.note: Alert for Northern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 9:31PM CST until December 21 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SNOW EXPECTED TO RESULT IN HAZARDOUS TRAVEL CONDITIONS TUESDAY... .A fast-moving weather system will bring snow to the area Tuesday. The snow will begin by mid-morning and then taper off during the afternoon. A total accumulation of 2 to 5 inches is expected across northern Wisconsin, with the highest totals near the Upper Michigan border. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Highest accumulations near the Iron Mountain area. * WHERE...Northern Marinette County County. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could linger through the Tuesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
